home.headline: Working Women: Stories That Inspire
home.description: Discover the experiences, challenges, and achievements of working women from different backgrounds, ages, and professions. A space to highlight and celebrate their contributions to society.
home.organizationtext: We are a social initiative entity, non-profit and declared of public utility since 1986, with a purpose focused on integrating people who are in or at risk of social exclusion due to various personal, academic or social circumstances. We promote professional qualification, with values and attitudes of responsibility and solidarity, so that people become sovereign and active protagonists in their own lives and society. At Peñascal Kooperatiba, our mission is to integrate people, especially those at a disadvantage, through training, professional qualification, labor activation, job creation, and fostering solidarity and citizenship values.

organization.title: Our Organization
organization.description: Learn more about who we are, our mission and vision, and how we work to highlight the stories of working women.
organization.mission_text: Our mission is to highlight and give voice to the experiences, challenges, and achievements of working women from different backgrounds, ages, and professions, contributing to the construction of a more equal and just society. Our vision is to create a space of recognition and appreciation of women’s work in all its forms, promoting equal opportunities and the empowerment of women in the workplace.
organization.values_text: We are guided by values of equality, respect, solidarity, inclusion, and empowerment. We believe in recognizing and valuing women’s work in all its forms, promoting a culture of equality and social justice.

member1.name: María González
member1.bio: Founder of the project with over 15 years of experience in the social field and in defending women's labor rights.

member2.name: Laura Rodríguez
member2.bio: Specialist in managing social projects with a gender focus. She has worked in various international organizations.

faq.a1: It is an initiative that aims to highlight the stories and experiences of working women from different backgrounds, ages, and professions, emphasizing their contributions to society and the challenges they face.
faq.q2: How can I share my story?
faq.a2: You can contact us through the form on our website or send us an email. We will conduct an interview and work with you to shape your story.
faq.a3: All working women, regardless of their profession, age, or origin, can share their experiences. We seek to represent the diversity of the female workforce.
faq.q4: How can I support this project?
faq.a4: You can spread the stories on social media, participate in our events, or volunteer to help collect and edit stories.

footer.title: Want to share your story?
footer.text: Join our project and help us highlight the experiences of working women.
